title: DOJ and Commerce Launch Disruptive Technology Strike Force to Protect Assets, Target Foes
description: Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco (C) flanked by Attorney General Merrick Garland (L) and FBI Director Christopher Wray (R) speaks during a news conference to announce an international ransomware enforcement action at the Department of Justice in Washington on Jan. 26, 2023. (Jose Luis Magana/AP Photo)

title: Tesla Recalls 362,000 US Vehicles Over Full Self-Driving Software
description: The logo of Tesla is seen at a Tesla Supercharger station in Dietikon, Switzerland, on Oct. 21, 2020. (Arnd Wiegmann/Reuters)

title: GOP Lawmaker Introduces Bill Blocking Children Under 16 From Using Social Media
description: Sen. Josh Hawley (R-Mo.) delivers remarks during the Senate Judiciary Committee confirmation hearing for Supreme Court nominee Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson in the Hart Senate Office Building on Capitol Hill in Washington, on March 21, 2022. (Drew Angerer/Getty Images)

title: ‘Single World Government’ and AI Could ‘Doom’ Humanity Says Musk
description: Elon Musk talks virtually to UAE Minister of Cabinet Affairs Mohammad Al Gergawi during the World Government Summit in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, on Feb. 15, 2023. (Kamran Jebreili/AP Photo)

title: ‘Every Parent’s Nightmare’: TikTok Offering Child Predators an Easy Path to Contacting Kids
description: The logo for social media app TikTok is displayed on the screen of an iPhone on an American flag background in Arlington, Va., on Aug. 3, 2020. (Olivier Douliery/AFP via Getty Images)
